biotools.summary: The  wwLigCSRre web server performs ligand-based screening using 3D molecular similarity engine. Inputted 3D ligand molecules may be screened against banks such as Kinase-, CNS-, GPCR-, ion-channel-, antibacterial-, anticancer-, and analgesic-focused libraries or DrugBank database.
